title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente, then drain (reserve some pasta water).
In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté garlic until golden.
Add red pepper flakes and stir for a few seconds.
Toss in the cooked spaghetti and mix well. If dry, add a bit of reserved pasta water.
Season with salt, pepper, and sprinkle parsley.
Serve hot with Parmesan cheese, if desired.

title: Classic Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, mix milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Combine wet and dry ingredients; mix until just combined (don’t overmix).
Heat a pan and grease lightly with butter. Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook the other side until golden brown.
Serve with syrup, butter, or fresh fruit.
